name: FanConscom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: FanCons.com provides a list of fan conventions around the world. Using the FanCons.com database, this Alexa Flash Briefing will tell you what conventions are coming up this week so you can head out to meet other fans for whatever fandom you're in.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
